content: change delete button to a red button. and save button replace it with an emoji. when delete button is pressed, delete the document from firestore as well. when saving a document, update the current document, instead of creating a new one

Updated the code to change the delete button to a red button, replace the save button with an emoji, delete the document from Firestore when the delete button is pressed, and update the current document when saving a document instead of creating a new one.
